detectors.description:
Reentrancy in ProtocolFeeVault.fundDAO() (ProtocolFeeVault.sol#849-871):
	External calls:
	- lrcAddress.safeTransferAndVerify(recipient,amountDAO) (ProtocolFeeVault.sol#860)
	- require(bool,string)(BurnableERC20(lrcAddress).burn(amountBurn),BURN_FAILURE) (ProtocolFeeVault.sol#864)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- claimedBurn = claimedBurn.add(amountBurn) (ProtocolFeeVault.sol#867)
	IProtocolFeeVault.claimedBurn (ProtocolFeeVault.sol#696) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- ProtocolFeeVault.getProtocolFeeStats() (ProtocolFeeVault.sol#900-924)
	- claimedDAOFund = claimedDAOFund.add(amountDAO) (ProtocolFeeVault.sol#868)
	IProtocolFeeVault.claimedDAOFund (ProtocolFeeVault.sol#695) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- ProtocolFeeVault.getProtocolFeeStats() (ProtocolFeeVault.sol#900-924)
